ds2.1.3:1.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ
ds2.1.3:1.2_1: atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca
ds2.1.3:1.2_2: pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye
ds2.1.3:2.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma
ds2.1.3:2.2_1: viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
ds2.1.3:2.2_2: viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.3:3.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma
ds2.1.3:3.2_1: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
ds2.1.3:3.2_2: viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
ds2.1.3:4.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye arūpūpapattiyā maggaṁ bhāveti sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma
ds2.1.3:4.2_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāsahagataṁ sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja
ds2.1.3:4.2_2: viharati upekkhāsahagataṁ, tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti …pe… avikkhepo hoti …pe…
